title: “Podium” means one or more floors of a building extending beyond building line/s used for parking, providing other services and incidental purposes as prescribed under these Regulations
clause_text: “Podium” means one or more floors of a building extending beyond building line/s used for parking, providing other services and incidental purposes as prescribed under these Regulations.
